classification.task_goal: Write an academic article supporting anti-natalism with structured arguments and references.
primary_constraints: Use academic tone and logical sentences.
List all references at the end using APA-7 style.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially failed to provide references for the introduction and conclusion, which violated the constraint of listing references in APA-7 style. The user pointed out this omission, prompting the AI to acknowledge the need for references, thus repairing the violation.
